resources.string: The Indian Constitution was adopted on 26th November, 1949.
The Indian constitution allows dual citizenship.
In 1853, the first Indian passenger train ran between Bombay and Thane.
The President of India is the Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces.
Hon\'ble Mr. Justice Harilal Jekisundas Kania was the first Chief Justice of India.
India shares its borders with 5 countries.
The idea of Directive Principles of State Policy was adopted in the Indian Constitution from the Constitution of Italy.
